page.title: 11ENTERTAINMENT (ARTS) IN WGC.
page.content: Entertainment in the Garden City is mainly provided by the {Barn Theatre } and is supplemented by the {Welwyn {Thalians. }The Barn Theatre is {300 } years old and was moved to its present site in {1830. }Originally it was known as the Handside Barn and prior to its thespian activities was a dairy and a clubhouse for Welwyn Department Store employees.Between October and July the drama group are involved in { {10}productions,at least one enters competions at national level.The {Welwyn Thalians }was formed by joining {2}existing societies, the Barnstormers & the Operatic Society. There are {50} members who rehearse in our block but use the near by facilities of Campus West,our Council Leisure Centre,to stage their productions.
